interface.description: Interface handling IPv4 network layer status information.

field.name: IP, Datagrams Received/sec
field.description: Datagrams received from the network, per second.

field.name: IP, Datagrams Sent/sec
field.description: Datagrams sent to the network, per second.

field.name: IP, Datagrams Total/sec
field.description: Total number of datagrams sent or received on the network, per second.

field.name: IP, Datagrams Outbound Discarded
field.description: Outbound datagrams that have been discarded.

field.name: IP, Datagrams Outbound Errors
field.description: Outbound datagrams lost due to errors.

field.name: IP, Datagrams Received Discarded
field.description: Received datagrams that have been discarded.

field.name: IP, Datagrams Received Errors
field.description: Received datagrams lost due to errors.
